data.meta_description: Learn about Pieter Verhoeff on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Pieter Verhoeff, such as The Letter for the King.
data.text: Pieter Verhoeff was a Dutch film director. He studied at the Netherlands Film and Television Academy and graduated in 1966. He is known for his films The Mark of the Beast, The Dream and The Moving True Story of a Woman Ahead of Her Time. All three stories take place in his native Friesland. He won two Golden Calf's in his career.
